title: Empower Your Thoughts by Scott Allan (ePub)
description:
Empower Your Thoughts: How to Build a Positive Mindset that Converts Great Ideas Into Successful Moneymaking Ventures by Scott Allan
English | 2015 | Non-fiction, Self-Help | 1.2 MB
 
http://ultraimg.com/images/21b624.jpg

Empower Your Thoughts and create a powerful mindset that turns your next BIG idea into a thriving business!
What if you could master your thoughts instead of being a slave to them? What if you could channel your positive mindset into building a system of solid ideas that doubled and tripled your income? What if you could create a stream of passive income so you could spend more time with family and friends? What if you could tap into your creative side and utilize the same technique used by Thomas Edison to build anything you want?
Interested? Keep readingâ€¦
â€œEmpower Your Thoughtsâ€ is packed with invaluable tips, strategies and actionable content for building a positive mindset, empowering your thoughts and then combining these elements to turn your best ideas into a thriving business that makes cash!
By reading Empower Your Thoughts today you will learn:
How to develop a reliable system for Capturing valuable ideas on the move How to master your circumstances so you take charge of your own life How to take immediate action by implementing a simple idea capable of doubling your income FAST How to turn fearful and negative thoughts into golden opportunity How to develop new strategies that generates dynamic ideas for creating your dream job How to get more focused and direct your thoughts to work for you instead of against you How to empower your attitude by reframing past events keeping you trapped How to improve your relationships with people and form stronger alliances How to organize your ideas using my simple 3-step folder system so that you never lose any valuable ideas How to implement the Cross Fertilization strategy Edison employed to create world-class inventions How to build your dream on existing platforms that have already done the heavy How to put your ideas to the test before you spend one dollar on a worthless investment How to utilize powerful apps such as Evernote to organize your ideas in an east-to-manage system
But wait, thereâ€™s more! Youâ€™ll also discoverâ€¦
The 3 powerful life lessons my father taught me so that I could empower my thinking for future success The 4 pillars of building a Positive Mindset so you can gain better clarity, peace of mind, and control over your emotions and actions How to integrate the elements of your positive mindset and keep your mind free of clutter so that you can expand your mental space to create great ideas How to be a master of your environment instead of its servant
Download Empower Your Thoughts today and create an easy, step-by-step plan for capturing, organizing and implementing your good ideas and turn them into a thriving business.
